title: Unable to access non secure sites over wifi. Trying to access www.cyclingnews.com over Virgin Media
content: Trying to access www.cyclingnewscom over wifi and get error message. Error accessing site. If I access it over mobile data it is fine but a warning stating site is not secure. This is only happening on a Pixel phone. On a  old android and not upto date tablet it works along with apple devices.  This only started to happen yesterday before I updated with April Security Update.
